Commenting on Saved Reports

Saved reports contain a comment feature that can be docked or un-docked from the screen. This tool lets you annotate reports with your own comments and notes of interest, and can also be used as a “wiki” feature for shared reports, as in the example shown here:

 

When you click the ADD button, the comment will be added to the comment log for the report, viewable to anyone with access to it. As more comments are added, they will be added to the stream of comments for the report as shown here:
